propellerhat.str_desc: A simple multi-color striped hat with a propeller on top. A staple of every juvenile’s youth.
propellerhat.str_onbreak: Your hat takes a hit, detatching the propeller and sending it twirling into the stratosphere. Looks like you'll never see it again.

mininghelmet.str_desc: A typical construction hard hat with a head lamp strapped onto it.

pickelhaube.str_desc: A traditional Prussian spiked helmet from the nineteenth century.

fedora.str_desc: A soft brimmed hat with a pinched crown. A classic piece of vintage Americana and a staple of film noir. Not to be confused with the trilby, the fedora is a hat befitting the hardboiled men of it’s time.

baseballcap.str_desc: A classic baseball cap. A staple of American culture and subsequently freedom from tyranny. If you don’t own at least one of these hats you might as well have hopped the fence from Tijuana last night. Yeah, I’m racist, that going to be a problem for you??

backwardsbaseballcap.str_desc: A classic baseball cap… with an urban twist! Heh, 'sup dawg? Nothing much, man. You know me, just mining some goddamn slime. Word 'n shit. Hell yeah.
backwardsbaseballcap.str_onadorn: You whip out your baseball cap and apply it...backwards. Fuck, now we're getting serious.

piratehat.str_desc: A swashbuckling buccaneer’s tricorne, stylized with a jolly roger on the front.
piratehat.str_onadorn: Y'ARRRRRRR! You adorn ye' tricorne and spit at a nearby pedestrian.
piratehat.str_onbreak: You hat is torn to shreds. Welp, no more shivering timbers.

eyepatch.str_desc: A black eyepatch. A striking accessory for the particularly swashbuckling, chauvinistic, or generally hardboiled of you. Genuine lack of two eyes optional and not recommended.
eyepatch.str_unadorn: You remove your eyepatch to reveal the grisly wound benea- wait. Your eye is just fine! What kind of pathetic pirate LARPer did you turn out to be?

cigarette.str_desc: A single cigarette sticking out of your mouth. You huff these things down in seconds but you’re never seen without one. Everyone thinks you’re really, really cool.
cigarette.str_onadorn: You stick the cigarette in your mouth, swave as a baby's bottom. You wonder how many of these could fit in your mouth.

headband.str_desc: A headband wrapped tightly around your forehead with long, flowing ends.

handkerchief.str_desc: A bandanna tied on your head, creating a simple cap.

bandanna.str_desc: A handkerchief tied around your neck and covering your lower face.

pairofsunglasses.str_desc: An iconic pair of black sunglasses. Widely recognized as the coolest thing you can wear.

pairofglasses.str_desc: A simple pair of eyeglasses. You have perfectly serviceable eyesight, but you are a sucker for the bookworm aesthetic. People with actual issues with sight hate you.

scarf.str_desc: A very thick striped wool scarf, in case 110° degrees is too nippy for you.

witchhat.str_desc: A pointy, cone-shaped hat with a wide brim. It exudes a spooky essence.

bomberhat.str_desc: A thick fur and leather aviator’s hat.

tuxedo.str_desc: A classy, semi-formal suit for dashing rogues you can’t help but love. Instant charisma granted upon each !adorn.

beanie.str_desc: A simple beanie with a pointed top and a slip stitch brim.

jestershat.str_desc: A ridiculous, multi-colored hat with four bells dangling from protruding sleeves.

pairof3dglasses.str_desc: A pair of totally tubular, ridiculously radical 3D glasses. Straight up stereoscopic, dude!

necktie.str_desc: A vintage necktie, reeking of coffee, college, and shaving cream.

vikinghelmet.str_desc: A pointy bronze helmet with two sharp horns jutting out of the base.

pairofflipflops.str_desc: A pair of loud, obnoxious flip flops. The price of your comfort is higher than you could ever know.

fez.str_desc: A short fez with a tassel attached to the top. Fezzes are cool. Or, are bowties cool? You forget, and frankly you’re embarrassed you remember either one of them.

bowtie.str_desc: A quite dapper, neatly tied butterfly bowtie. Bowties are cool. Or, are fezzes cool? You forget, and frankly you’re embarrassed you remember either one of them.

cowboyhat.str_desc: An essential piece of Wild West memorabilia, a bonafide ten gallon Stetson. Befitting the individualistic individuals that made them famous. Yeehaw, and all that stuff.

kepi.str_desc: A short kepi with a sunken top and an insignia on the front.

tamoshanter.str_desc: A traditional Scottish wool bonnet with a plaid pattern.

ushanka.str_desc: A traditional Russian fur cap with thick wool ear flaps.

karategi.str_desc: A traditional Japanese karateka’s outfiit, complete with a belt with extended ends that easily flow in the wind for dramatic effect.

turban.str_desc: A traditional Arabian headdress, lavishly decorated with a single large jewel and protruding peacock feather.

nemes.str_desc: The traditional ancient Egyptian pharaoh's striped head cloth.

varsityjacket.str_desc: An American baseball jacket, with a large insignia on the left side of the chest.

sombrero.str_desc: A traditional Mexican sombrero, with an extra-wide brim to protect you from the blistering Arizonian sun.

hawaiianshirt.str_desc: A brightly colored Hawaiian shirt with a floral pattern. It reeks of slima colada and the complementary shampoo from the resort in Assault Flats Beach.

fursuit.str_desc: A fursuit. Custom-made and complete with high quality faux fur, padded digitigrade legs, follow-me eyes, adjustable facial expressions, and a fan in the head. It is modeled off your original character, also known as your fursona. Some would call its character design “ugly” or “embarrassing,” but you think it's perfect.

diadem.str_desc: The traditional Greco-Roman laurel wreath symbolizing sovereignty and power. Be careful about wearing this around in public, you might just wake up with 23 stab wounds.

billshat.str_desc: A military beret with a shield insignia on the front.

weddingring.str_desc: A silver ring with a decently large diamond on top. For the person you love most in the entire world. <3

earbuds.str_desc: A pair of white standard iPod earbuds. Who knows what sort of tasty jams you must be listening to while walking down the street?

nursesoutfit.str_desc: A disturbingly revealing nurse’s outfit that shows off your lumpy, fleshy visage. No one likes that you wear this. Theming bonus for responding to people’s crackpot ideas in the nurse’s office, though.

heartboxers.str_desc: A staple of comedy. A pair of white boxers with stylized cartoon hearts tiled all over it. Sure hope your pants aren’t hilariously ripped or unadorned while you’re wearing these, how embarrassing! Hahaha! We like to have fun here.

kilt.str_desc: A traditional scottish garmet that's plaid, and it's not a fuckin' skirt, aight?

cigar.str_desc: Much more manly then a puny cigarette. This cigar has been freshly imported from cuba and is thick enough to last for hours.

captainshat.str_desc: The perfect hat for sailing across the Slime Sea, commanding a navy fleet, or prematurely ending your lucrative My Little Pony review series in favor of starting a shitty Pokemon Nuzlocke series. For shame.

juveolantern.str_desc: Hand-carved with a hole just barely big enough to fit your head in, this Juve O' Lantern severely hinders your combat ability. But, you look fucking sick while wearing it, so who cares.

bowlerhat.str_desc: A simply traditional billyock. You’re gonna be the talk of the toy box with this dashing felt cosmetic! Now you just have to work on the moustache.

cabbagetreehat.str_desc: An unmistakably Australian hat, with a wide brim and a high crown.

braces.str_desc: An old fashioned orthodontic headgear. Elaborate metal wires and braces hold your nearly eroded, crooked teeth together in what can genously be called a mouth. You are in agony, and so is everyone that looks at you.

hoodie.str_desc: Perfect for keeping warm in the middle of the blisteringly hot Arizonian desert! Heatstroke or bust!

copbadge.str_desc: What the fuck are you doing with this thing? Are you TRYING to make the sewers your permanent residence? Acquaint yourself with the !drop command and FAST, before you don’t have a body to wear the badge on.

strawhat.str_desc: A wide-brimmed straw hat, the perfect hat for farming.

cosplayhorns.str_desc: You’re not entirely sure what these things are, but they sort of look like brightly painted, candy corn colored, paper mache horns that are hot glued onto a black headband. Their purpose is mysterious, but for some reason you are inclined to adorn them… perhaps you understood their importance in a past life.

yourfavoritehat.str_desc: ***It fits perfectly, and it’s just your style! You love wearing this cosmetic far more than any other, it’s simply the best.***

pajamaonesie.str_desc: A soft jumpsuit with an audacious, repeating design printed over the entire cosmetic. You feel like getting a little bit fucking rowdy wearing this outrageous onesie.

pairofcircularsunglasses.str_desc: Sunglasses, but in a circle! Genius! You can't wait to show the world your hot takes on television shows for girls.

flowercrown.str_desc: A lovingly handcrafted crown of flowers, connected by a string. You’re gonna be famous on Pinterest with a look like this!

spikedbracelets.str_desc: Hilariously unrealistic spiked bracelets, ala Bowser, King of the Koopas. You’re hyper aware of these fashion disasters whenever you’re walking, making sure to swing them as far away from your body as possible.

slimecorppin.str_desc: An enamel pin of the SlimeCorp logo, a badge of loyalty to your favorite charismatic megacorporation. Dude, like, *”Follow He Who Turns The Wheels”*, bro!!

overalls.str_desc: Simple, humble denim overalls, for a simple, humble farmer such as yourself.

rustynail.str_desc: A large, rusty nail, planted right between the sides of your head, like some kind of frankenstein costume piece. This one's the real deal though... oh god the pain...

fullmetaljacket.str_desc: A black leather jacket affixed with more spikes than you can count on your fingers and toes. Be careful not to bump into anyone with this thing on.

tinfoilhat.str_desc: A hat that protects you from SlimeCorp's patent-pending 5G binaural brain waves, or so the folks on the internet have told you.

resplendentcoronet.str_desc: A crown worn by only the most elegant and regal of nobles. When you put it on, you really feel like you fuckin' own the place.

raincoat.str_desc: A specially engineered piece of personal armor, that protects you from the deadly threat from above.

halloweenmedallion.str_desc: A glistening crystal medallion, carved in the shape of a pumpkin. It is strewn together with black pearls. Awarded only to the bravest of souls who managed to best the Double Headless Double Horseman in combat.

pileus.str_desc: A symbol of freedom and liberty. In ancient times, these felt caps were given to slaves who had been emancipated.

seacowcostume.str_name: Attractive Gray Sea Cow Mascot Costume for Adult
seacowcostume.str_desc: Attractive. That's really all there is to say on the matter.

wrappingpaperhat.str_desc: A hat made out of wrapping paper, fashioned in a way rather similar to a newspaper hat. How festive!

knightarmor.str_desc: A shining set of steel armor.

velcroshoes.str_desc: Juveniles in the city always had a hard time tying their laces, so these stylish kicks are perfect for them.

crocs.str_desc: The perfect pair of footwear for when you want spotted dots of sunburn on your feet, unless you're wearing socks that is. If that's the case ignore that earlier statement.

janusmask.str_desc: A simple, yet elegant mask, awarded to those deemed worthy by Janus himself at the end of every Swilldermuk. It's enigmatic powers allow you to procure prank items from thin air.

leatherjacket.str_desc: A black leather jacket. Gangs of Killers stalking the streets are often found wearing these.

afrowig.str_desc: The perfect hair-do for a 70's party or a pool party just be sure to keep a can of hairspray and comb at hand.

pompadourwig.str_desc: A must have for any wannabe greaser or school delinquent in general. Make sure to wear it like a true king.

powderedwig.str_desc: If it was good enough for the british and founding fathers, it's good enough for us, right? Just make sure you don't share this wig without cleaning it.

rainbowafrowig.str_desc: A colorful wig worthy of a real chuckle.

ghostlygibus.str_desc: A crooked old top hat with a spooky toy ghost popping out of the top.

gasmask.str_desc: A dysfunctional cold war era gas mask that fully encapsulates the head.

firefightershelmet.str_desc: A old NLACakaNM wide brimmed red firefighter's helmet. No one knows what happened to the firefighters of Endless War.

pairofpoindexterglasses.str_desc: A pair of thick rim glasses taped together at the middle. Worthy of any true nerd or nerdette.

duncecap.str_desc: It’s a pointy cap that says dunce on it, duh! You’re a real smartie aren't you?

vrheadset.str_desc: Endless War -- now in stunning VR!

blindfold.str_desc: Ok now you’re just bragging. Walking around with a blindfold of all things? How ridiculous!

chickenmask.str_desc: The rubber chicken mask gives you a strange vibe, it stinks of sweat and dried blood.

mountiehat.str_desc: A hat that's mostly used by canada's royal mounted police, but how did it get here? Did it float down the slime river?

bearskinhat.str_desc: A towering fuzzy hat that’s commonly worn by guards of the british royal guard.

aviatorshat.str_desc: A leather hat with a neat pair of goggles on it. Perfect for an unfortunate circumnavigation of the world.

militaryberet.str_desc: A good soldier needs good headwear,and that’s where this beret comes in.

felinehat.str_desc: A hat striped with red and white is quite right for a fanciful fight! It’s a funny hat at that, and it looks like it’s been worn by a cat!

tikihead.str_desc: A wearable tiki head worthy of any luau or tropical island themed party.

reinforcedkfcbucket.str_desc: A stronger, more durable version of the average KFC bucket. Intended to be worn by shamblers in Dr. Downpour's legion of the undead.

reinforcedjuveolantern.str_desc: A stronger, more durable version of the average Juve-O'-Lantern. Intended to be worn by shamblers in Dr. Downpour's legion of the undead.

rollerblades.str_desc: A wicked sicknasty D-I-Y set of inline skates. These ones may not be magnetically driven or powered by netrium batteries, but they do the job just fine.
rollerblades.str_onadorn: You slip into your rollerblades and tighten the straps. Let's get scratchin'.
rollerblades.str_unadorn: You unfasten the belts and straps on your rollerblades.
rollerblades.str_onbreak: Your rollerblades break down! Time to make a break for it on foot!
